channel.title: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan
channel.description:
Well, as the title says, whenever I activate the big fan (which is one of the requirements to kill the tentacle monster) the game crashes and I get and error message saying "Hl2.exe has stopped working. Every time I tried I gpt the same error message and crash.
Is this a known issue and can it be solved or worked around?
Other than that, I really got to hand it you guys who did this in your spare time. Fantastic game so far. Love how the weapons handle and everything! Really brings me back to when I played hl1 back in the day :slight_smile:

item.title: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan
item.dc:creator: Doktor_Teufel
item.description:
M4TT:

Maybe it’s your computer. Mind posting your specifications (e.g video card, processor, RAM, etc)?

I doubt that, since the problem has affected a wide variety of computers and, furthermore, can be resolved in-engine by removing physics objects. It would seem the bug has something to do with the airflow from the fan attempting to lift crates and/or pallets.

Removing the crates and pallets might be the most expedient way to resolve this bug. There are only a few such objects and none are necessary in the room.

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan

item.title: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan
item.dc:creator: P0s3id0n
item.description:
the same thing happen to me i fixed it by making sure nothing fell down there before i turned the fan on
just my 2 cents haha

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan

item.title: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan
item.dc:creator: wasker
item.description:
I couldn’t get it to work either so I tried to restart the chapter (newgame > select chapter) and then it worked without any crashes

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan

item.title: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan
item.dc:creator: Giazzo
item.description:
I had the same problem. Sounds incredible but, as blastedt said, destroying all the wooden boxes nearby and THEN activating the fan resolved the bug.

Don’t ask me why. I just know that it worked for me.

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan

item.title: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan
item.dc:creator: Doktor_Teufel
item.description:
blastedt:

Throw all the boxes nearby down the pit before activating the fan.

Thanks! That worked a treat. I also threw in all the barrels, canisters and pallets in the entire room beforehand just to be sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Game crashes whenever I activate the Big Fan
item.dc:creator: metalmunki
item.description:
Khrn:

It happened to me too, but I can’t get it to work. It crashes everytime. Only area where it happens.

Windows 8
Intel i7 2600k
ATI Radeon HD 7970
16 GB RAM

Isn’t Windows 8 a beta OS?

Read full topic

Guess I’m stuck until a fix shows up.
